name: Jumper (raptor9999, kruffin)
description:
A futuristic sort of Metroidvania game being developed and built for the Metroidvania 13 game jam, starting on August 15th, 2021 and ending September 15th, 2021.

Game auto saves when you go through each door to the next scene, and auto reloads from these points on death. Manual quick saves (keys shown below) are separate.

NOTE: For Linux, after download, you must make jumper.x86_64 executable with chmod +x jumper.x86_64 then run jumper.x86_64

Controls:

Keyboard/Mouse

A and D or Arrow Keys for movement

U: Unlocked Abilities menu (shows what abilities you have unlocked for use)

Spacebar or W: Jump/Multi jump/Wall jump

E: Dash (if unlocked)

Aim with mouse, Mouse 1 shoots, Mouse 2 charge shot (if unlocked), Middle Mouse fire missile (or Alt key on keyboard)

F5: Quick Save Game

F6: Quick Load Game

ESC: Pause Menu

Gamepad

Left Stick/D pad for movement

Dualshock Cross/Xbox A/Nintendo B: Jump/Multi jump/Wall jump

Dualshock Circle/Xbox B, Nintendo A: Dash (if unlocked)

Use M key to turn off mouse aim, use Right Stick for aiming

Dualshock Square/Xbox X/Nintendo Y OR R1: shoots

R2: ;Charge shot (if unlocked)

L1: Fire missiles

Start: Pause Menu

Select: Unlocked Abilities menu (shows what abilities you have unlocked for use)

Programming, Art, and Design

* kruffin (RejectCode)
* raptor9999 (raptor0999)
